description:
Flashback to the girl`s childhood and the strange coincidences that united them on a small park before they even knew one another.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: It Was One Day Some Time Ago, So Yeah / And Then, One Day, So Yeah
Sore wa Itsuka no Hi no Koto, na no de / Soshite Aru Hi no Koto, na no de
それはいつかの日のこと, なので / そしてある日のこと, なので
